    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Administrator
    The Administrator class represents an administrator user in the hospital management system.
    Appointment
    Represents an appointment in the hospital management system.
    AppointmentDoctorView
    Interface representing the doctor's view of appointments.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    Represents an appointment outcome record, including appointment details, prescribed medications, and consultation notes.
    AppointmentPatientView
    Interface representing the patient's view of appointments.
    AppointmentStatus
    Represents the status of an appointment in the hospital management system.
    Billing
    The Billing class handles all billing-related functionalities, such as adding bills, calculating bill amounts, updating billing status, and verifying the integrity of the billing blockchain.
    billingAdmin
    Interface representing administrative billing operations in the hospital management system.
    billingPatient
    Interface representing patient billing operations in the hospital management system.
    Block
    Represents a block in the blockchain used for billing records.
    Blockchain
    Represents a blockchain used for billing records in the hospital management system.
    DiagnosisTreatment
    The DiagnosisTreatment class represents the relationship between a diagnosis and its corresponding treatment plan.
    Doctor
    The Doctor class represents a doctor in the hospital management system.
    Feedback
     
    Gender
    Enumeration representing the gender of a person.
    Inventory
    The Inventory class manages a collection of medications in the hospital management system.
    MedicalRecordDoctorView
    Interface representing the doctor's view of a patient's medical records.
    MedicalRecordPatientView
    Interface representing the patient's view of their medical records.
    MedicalRecords
    The MedicalRecords class represents the medical records of a patient.
    Medication
    The Medication class represents a medication item in the hospital management system.
    Patient
    The Patient class represents a patient user in the hospital management system.
    Pharmacist
    The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist in the hospital management system.
    Prescription
    The Prescription class represents a prescription in the hospital management system.
    PrescriptionStatus
    Enumeration representing the status of a prescription.
    ReplenishmentRequest
    Represents a replenishment request for medications.
    Staff
    The Staff class is an abstract class that extends User and represents staff members in the hospital management system.
    User
    The User class is an abstract base class that represents a user in the hospital management system.
